job.title: Software Engineer (Backend)
job.description: We are looking for brilliant software engineers who have a passion for consumer products and want to join an energetic team that is changing the way people think about travel We ship code daily AB test extensively and have a primary role in creating the product from inception to implementation Theres much to do and youll be responsible for making some real cool stuff happenltbrgtltbrgtOur APIs internal services and web app are at the core of our stable of software thats reinventing mobility Be a member of a small team of talented engineers and designers and play a major role in shaping an exciting app thats changing how people travel and think about car ownershipltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtLearn more about our Engineering team here ltstronggtltstronggthttpswwwbeforeyouapplycomteamengineeringatturoltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtYou will collaborate extensively with product management design and engineers to develop product features that drive our metricsltligtltligtYou will produce highquality maintainable code test it collaboratively review it and ship itltligtltligtYou will identify areas to improve and scale our architecture and application designltligtltligtYou will develop tools and utilities to diagnose and fix problemsltligtltligtEnsure proper technical design and documentationltligtltligtWork efficiently in a constantly changing and growing environment where the process is fluid and creative solutions are desiredltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtYour ProfileltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelorsMasters degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related fieldltligtltligtTypically a minimum of 2 years experience shipping highscale code to productionltligtltligtFluent in at least one language  eg Java Python Ruby Go or CltligtltligtPossess strong computer science fundamentals data structures algorithms database concepts distributed systems and searchltligtltligtStrong communicator Explaining technical concepts and challenges to other engineers is no problem for youltligtltligtEnjoy solving problems and helping others meet their goalsltligtltligtPassionate about learning the ins and outs of a variety of backend technologiesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtBenefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtCompetitive salary and equity for all fulltime employeesltligtltligtEmployerpaid medical dental vision insurance and 401k matchltligtltligtFlexible paid time off 11 paid holidays paid volunteer time off and paid parental leaveltligtltligtTuro host matching and vehicle reimbursement programltligtltligtMonthly Fringe benefits stipendltligtltligtMonthly Turo travel creditltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout TuroltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtTuro is the worlds largest car sharing marketplace where you can book any car you want wherever you want it from a vibrant community of trusted hosts across the US Canada and the UK Guests choose from a totally unique selection of nearby cars while hosts earn extra money to offset the costs of car ownership A pioneer of the sharing economy and the travel industry Turo is a safe supportive community where the car you book is part of a story not a fleet Discover Turo at httpsturocom the App Store and Google Play and check out our blog Field NotesltbrgtltbrgtTuro has raised 450M to date from toptier investors including IAC Daimler AG Kleiner Perkins GV Canaan Partners August Capital and Shasta VenturesltbrgtltbrgtTuro cultivates a tightknit team of smart critical thinkers who care about their work and their colleagues Our recruiting team is always on the lookout for supportive downtoearth pioneering and efficient candidates to grow our teams talent and enrich our cultureltbrgtltbrgtRead more about the Turo culture according to Turo CEO Andre HaddadltbrgtltbrgtWere an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We dont discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender gender identity sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status When in doubt please applyltbrgtltbrgt
